preferences.title: Interests
preferences.paragraph-1: I love variety. I love to switch between front-end and back-end, but also to experience challenging problems. I'm comfortable with a wide range of stacks, as a real full-stack developer, including a DevOps part. Though my preference is starting to grow a little towards back-end 😉
preferences.paragraph-2: I'm not a fan of quick & dirty solutions, give me systems where performance, security and stability are key essentials. I'm a big supporter of clean code, best practices but also forward-thinking technologies. To build a stable and expandable ecosystems (in the ideal world)!

titlebar.name: Rhino van Boxelaere
titlebar.title: Software Engineer
titlebar.description: Logic is my backbone, to bring project to a good end with a strong and forward-thinking mindset. I am dependable, creative and down-to-earth, with a clear vision towards the future. My door is always open to spar over any problem, thought-chain or technology! (or anything, really)

toast.title: Did you know?
toast.content: The PDF that will be made available very shortly, is 100% client-sided 😄. A screenshot of this webpage is taken, and will be provided to you as a download in pdf format!
